description:
Bob Marley believed that you could cure racism and hate, literally cure hate, by injecting music and love into peoples lives...
👉🏽WOULD YOU AGREE?

“Me only have one ambition, y’know. I only have one thing I really like to see happen. I like to see mankind live together – black, white, Chinese, everyone – that’s all.”
Bob Marley ❤️💛💚
👉🏽Marley is an inspiration to live, he believed in togetherness, he believed that there is only hope if humans stick together and he's right about it.

❗️”Black Lives Matter"" wasn't ""hijacked,"" it was created to do exactly what it is doing now, to do it's part in bringing down & finally destroying America once & for all for the purposes of bringing in a New World Order. This is not about ""race vs. race,"" this is about total domination of the complete human race.

Better to die fighting for freedom then be a prisoner all the days of your life.🔥🔥🔥
Bob Marley❤️💛💚
